champ_0120_dragon_02:
I was watching your battle with the Gym Leader
from the sidelines, and I must say...[npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_03:
I thought it was simply excellent! Full marks!
Gold star! Extra credit, even![npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_04:
[BD06:0]Hardly had you sent out [pknm:1]
before\r
you\r
launched\r
into\r
your strategy![npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_05:
That unrelenting offensive! That flurry of attacks!
What an efficient way to corner the opponent![npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_06:
And what [an ;:n]artfully trained Pokémon! Such a
vibrant palette of moves![npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_07:
Ah! I do beg your pardon. I didn’t mean to let
my emotions run amok like that.[npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_08:
Ahem! In summary, I simply wanted to say that
you seem to have gotten even stronger.[npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_09:
I must admit I’m eager for you to gather all
the Gym Badges.[npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_10:
As a member of the Elite Four, I await the day
you come to face me with great anticipation![npcn:12]
champ_0120_dragon_11:
Oh, but one thing—don’t let your studies fall by
the wayside. Be sure to come to the academy\r
now and then![npcn:12]
